website_summaries.verdict: A very handy butter warmer with a long handle.
pros: Comes in five different color choices
A very good size for melting one stick of butter
Decent quality on the construction of this pot
cons: Like many other butter warmers, this pot does not come with a lid

customer_reviews.title: Beware of peeling!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pot just to boil water and in less than a year the non stick coating started peeling I could almost understand if it chipped but it was peeling off. Anyone know how I can contact the manufacturer?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, very small pot!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for warming a jar of gravy, cracking your husband over the head, or what I actually bought it for, making nectar for hummingbirds. It has a little pour lip, which helps me pour the nectar directly into the feeders without having to dirty a funnel. This pot/saucepan does not come with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J. Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy pot, but I'm allergic to the nonstick coating.
customer_reviews.text: Gosh, I wanted to love this little pot that I got specifically to heat milk for making lattes at home. But while it is cute, well made, very sturdy and easy to clean, there is clearly something in the non stick coating that I'm allergic to. I hoped it would wear off but I'm still getting allergic reactions after every use. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lorahbee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the pouring lip
customer_reviews.text: that feature sets this apart from other saucier type pans. Very nice and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Telesco

customer_reviews.title: Good all around pot for small cooking jobs
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, and it is the perfect size for preparing smaller portions of cooked cereal, or heating up small portions of other foods. I always use a low flame on my gas stove, and so I haven't noticed any damage to the pot. I also use silicone utensils so as not to damage the nonstick surface. I am not sure why it is named "Butter Warmer", as I believe it can be used for many other small cooking tasks.
customer_reviews.author: MLR

customer_reviews.title: Racheal Ray 16346 Cucina  butter warmer and saucepan.
customer_reviews.text: Now i really like this little saucepan first of all it looks really sturdy. i needed another because i had other for years and it was another brand and it looked warp from inside all scratch up.. I bought blue agave. it was nice and heavy.looked sturdy i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really like it so far! And the best thing is how easy it is to clean it! It's also big enough for various uses (heat up milk, cook oatmeal, make Turkish coffee, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Mika Neko

customer_reviews.title: Rachael Ray Pan
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Rachael Ray pan of this size. I actually wore the first one out using it every day for the past several years. I highly recommend this size for so many kitchen requirements. It's GREAT for those little jobs--he handiest pan in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: LKB

customer_reviews.title: it should be amazing. You can not buy the same quality product ...
customer_reviews.text: I must say, if you can purchase this product with this price, it should be amazing. You can not buy the same quality product at super market or any kind of kitchen tool store. This is a very nice little pot with incredibly descent quality. Good for making a few boiled eggs in the morning / warming milk or any other kind of liquid / boiling small portion of vegetable like broccoli, peas, carrot and tiny potatoes, etc. It is always on my stove.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: My favorite little pot!
customer_reviews.text: Love. Love. Love! Needed a tiny pot for cooking hot cereals. The pour spot makes this my favorite pot ever. The weight of the pot is perfect for cooking cream of wheat. No burning or scorching.
customer_reviews.author: M. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: super cute

customer_reviews.text: A nice little pot to heat water for tea or milk for hot chocolate. I threw away my tea kettle because this seems like a much more sanitary way to to.

customer_reviews.title: That I don't like. Also it should have a pour lip on ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy little pot - it's much more than a butter warmer. I really use it a lot. However, the outer finish has dulled a lot because I've put it in the dishwasher (top rack). That I don't like. Also it should have a pour lip on the other side for lefties too! Despite these things, it is my new go-to pot for small stuff.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pot
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot. Perfect for heating up small amounts such as canned veggies, soup etc. Super easy to clean. My go to pot.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing ever

customer_reviews.title: It is ok if you don't fill it up more ...

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!

customer_reviews.title: Chinese quality-beware!
customer_reviews.text: A little concerned with quality and durability. Returned the first pan that arrived and almost returned it also as the interior coating looked like it was already peeling from the top rim of the pan. Have used it a couple of times to boil eggs so no real contact with food, but still concerned. I do like the size and look of the pan just not the fit and finish of the Chinese product.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: One dish came broken which gave me an opportunity to see the quality and thickness of this piece would easily chip and/or break
customer_reviews.text: I impulsively bought the whole set including ceramic baking dishes. One dish came broken which gave me an opportunity to see the quality and thickness of this piece would easily chip and/or break. The quality of the pans were average, you can find better quality at Target

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable and just the right size for a small job!
customer_reviews.text: Nice small sauce pan. Just the right weight to show durability. Cleaning is easy, dishwasher safe, if hand washing it do not use anything abrasive. The finish was bright, shiny and even. I love the uniqueness of the color.

customer_reviews.title: Husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the pan especially the handle that is all he raved about.

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick coating coming off after only one month use!
customer_reviews.text: I have been happily using this little pot to boil water for tea/coffee and it was great until I noticed today the nonstick coating on the rim is starting to peal off! little black pieces of coating ending up in my drink! I only been using this for a month so I am VERY disappointed and surprised.
customer_reviews.author: a.d.

customer_reviews.title: Love for Italian meringues
customer_reviews.text: I make a lot of Italian meringues for macarons, mousses and frostings, and wanted just a little pot that I could use to make the sugar syrups. I love this so much I bought a second. It’s perfect for my needs. The small size and pour spout make it so much easier to make the meringues (pour with precision, and get all the syrup out of the pot and into the bowl without hitting the whisk). It’s super easy cleanup as well. I expect I’ll use it for more things because I like it so much, but I’m delighted that it’s so perfect for what I wanted it for!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great multitask small pot...
customer_reviews.text: The description for this pot call it a butter a pot. It is a great butter warmer but we use it for much more in our house. We use it to boil water for iced tea, warm up sauce, cook green beans, heat ingredients for icing.... My husband and daughter always comment on how nice the pan is.

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for heating up a single can of soup
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for heating up a single can of soup, water for coffee or tea, or cooking a single serving of rice/beans. The color is a nice muted red, and the pour spout design is greatly appreciated.

product_meta.title: Rachael Ray Cucina Butter Warmer / Small Saucepan - 0.75 Quart, Purple
product_meta.description: Color:Lavender PurpleEasily warm butter to pour over popcorn or heat milk for peppermint hot cocoa with the convenient Rachael Ray Cucina Hard Enamel Nonstick 3/4-Quart Butter Warmer. Designed by Rachael to fuse a comfortable style with everyday practicality, the modern, rustic design of the warmer is both inviting and super-functional. The small saucepan is crafted with a sturdy hard enamel porcelain exterior and durable aluminum construction to promote even heating. Incorporating the easy-to-use functionality and time-saving solutions Rach is known for, the small size of the saucepan aids in melting and heating foods quickly. The pan’s pour spout helps drizzle lemon-tarragon clarified butter over lobster rolls or aids in pouring warmed milk into sweet sponge cake batter. Rachael’s color sense meets convenience with the distinctive espresso-colored, PFOA-free nonstick that releases foods effortlessly, complements the exterior, and cleans up easily. Oven safe to 400°F, the pan is suitable for all stovetops, except induction. This rustic, earthy butter warmer is a welcome addition to inviting serveware, dinnerware and other cookware pieces in the Rachael Ray Cucina collection. Melt butter, appetites, and more with a warm touch of personality, using the functional, helpful Rachael Ray Cucina Hard Enamel Nonstick 3/4-Quart Butter Warmer.
feature_bullets: COOK LIKE RACHAEL RAY: Rachael Ray Cucina Cookware features rustic colors and modern design that fuses relaxed style and everyday functionality
MADE TO LAST: Crafted with durable aluminum and sturdy hard enamel porcelain exterior; espresso-colored, PFOA-free nonstick releases foods effortlessly
EASY HANDLING BUTTER WARMER: The 3/4-quart butter warmer heats foods quickly and boasts a dual-riveted rubberized stainless steel handle and a convenient pour spout
MELT IT DOWN: Butter warmer is oven safe to 400 degrees F and the mini saucepan is suitable for all stovetops, except induction
COMPLEMENTS YOUR COOKWARE: The butter pan is a welcome addition to serveware, dinnerware and other cookware in the Rachael Ray Cucina collection

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars248 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
